name: "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers" Part 2 Trivia Game | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Ivan Ooze disguise himself as to help take over Angel Grove?
questions.explanation:
A wizard.

	He disguised himself as "Ivan" and gave away jars of ooze. Despite kids not knowing what to do with it, they took it once they were told it was free. The ooze was a chemical compound that put the adults of Angel Grove under Ivan's spell and made them listen to him.

questions.text: One of the Ectomorphicon Titans that Ivan Ooze had under his control was the Hornitor. What was the name of the other one?
questions.explanation:
Scorpitron.

	The two machines were buried near his egg when he was defeated in the past. He called his machines Ectomorphicon Titans. They were named Hornitor and Scorpitron. During the final fight against the Ninja Megazord her possessed Hornitor and fought the zord himself.

questions.text: Which Ranger was initially upset over the animal he drew his powers from as a Ninjetti?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Adam was represented by the frog. He was the only one of the six who was disappointed by his sacred animal. He is also the only one who wasn't given a good description of what the animal spirit meant. Dulcea described the rest to their Rangers, to Adam she only said he was a frog, like the kind you kiss and it turns into a prince.

questions.text: What was the name of the comet barreling towards Earth?
questions.explanation:
Ryan's Comet.

	Ryan's Comet was first mentioned early in the movie as something that might be seen from the Observatory, which was saved by a fundraiser the Rangers participated in. Later in the movie the comet was used to help destroy Ivan Ooze as he was put in the path of the comet as it passed by Earth.

questions.text: Which Ranger defeated the skeleton monster?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Aisha was the first of the Rangers to be attacked by the monster. Tommy jumped on its back to lure it away from Kimberly. After riding the skeleton for awhile, he saw its weakness and managed to pull a bone out of its neck and it crumbled to the ground. They then chose to keep moving toward the "Great Power" before the skeleton creature managed to reassemble itself.

questions.text: Who was the first Ranger to defeat one of the rock monsters?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Tommy walked up to the apparent carvings of the monsters and was the first to be attacked by one, but it was Adam who defeated one first. Rocky nearly fell off a cliff saving Adam from being attacked. Adam in turn destroyed the same monster while trying to save Rocky from being attacked. He knocked it into the river and it broke to pieces.

questions.text: Tommy was the first Ranger to be shown morphed after they regained their powers.
questions.explanation:
True.

	After revealing the "Great Power" the animal spirits floated around the Rangers for a few moments and the camera zoomed in on Tommy. Then as the camera pulled out, Tommy was shown morphed, as the camera pulled out farther his teammates were also shown in a morphed state.

questions.text: Who was the first Ranger shown in their new zord?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Kimberly was the first to call on her new zord. Tommy's White Falcon Zord was the first to appear on screen, and he was the first to be shown inside his zord. Billy was the second and Adam the third to be seen inside their new vehicles.

questions.text: Which zord formed the "body" of the Ninja Megazord?
questions.explanation:
Ape.

	The Ape was most of the body with the Wolf forming the chest plate. The other zords served as the arms and legs. The Falcon was an optional component and didn't join with the others at first. Tommy and his zord joined in later, giving the Ninja Megazord the ability to fly.  Once Tommy was joined in, he became the main pilot of the zord.

questions.text: Who did Tommy and Aisha joke with about becoming a Power Ranger someday?
questions.explanation:
Fred.

	Fred joked about being both the silver and gold ranger. This was after Aisha made the joke about him being in line to be a Ranger someday.  At first he said that it was impossible, then Tommy told him anything was possible. Fred was responsible for saving the adults of Angel Grove from Ivan's brain washing after he told them all to go jump to their doom.
